extendedInfo.description: This app is a WIDGET, it will NOT WORK if you do not add it to your home screen.If you are having issues with a state not updating, it's not the app, it's probably your governor not posting proclamations.  Please contact me so we can resolve any issues.Let Flagnotify tell you when you need to lower your American and/or state flag to half staff (or perhaps if you own a boat, half mast).  We also tell you when to raise your flag back to full staff/mast.If you see something wrong, Email me, negative comments help no one. I currently can't scan for some states due to Governments not publishing the news in a consumable fashion.Please note: Flagnotify does not currently cover MS & OR. This widget is an extension of the service available from flagnotify.com.  For active notifications as an email or text message, sign up at flagnotify.com.Get your flag status and notifications right on your Android home screen!!This app is a widget that supports the flagnotify services.  If you don't know how to add a widget, please don't install.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use this for our ambulance station to know immediately when the flag status changes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great, super support.
reviews.comment: This app is just what I needed.  Didn\'t work for Oregon at first, but I got a response from the developer right away.  He fixed it, let me know that it was fixed, and gave me a refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Minnesota
reviews.comment: Does not update for Minnesota.  Author e-mailed me  directly and reports issue with state website has been fixed.  If so, 5 stars for app and 5 stars for customer service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PERFECT
reviews.comment: This is everything I have been looking for! Developer is always making improvements too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works like a champ. Great for pubic safety agencies that want to stay on top of the flag status and to pay tribute towards others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Re: My previous review
reviews.comment: Thanks for taking care of the problem, great App
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and Perfect
reviews.comment: Because of my personality, if the flag is at half mast everyone turns to me for the answer. I\'ve had this widget for about a year now and it\'s got a perfect batting average. No more lengthy Google searches for the answer! Someone else does it for me!
reviews.author: Sarai Kindred
